The shared vocabulary object.

# shared()

**Type Method**

Returns the shared vocabulary object.

## Declaration

```swift
class func shared() -> Self
```

## Return Value

The shared vocabulary object.

## Discussion

Always use this method to retrieve the vocabulary object for your iOS app.
title: shared()
